kv2.2:1.3: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.5: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.7: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:2.1: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:2.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.1: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:4.3: Arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya, pisuṇaṁ bhaṇeyya, pharusaṁ bhaṇeyya, samphaṁ palapeyya, sandhiṁ chindeyya, nillopaṁ hareyya, ekāgāriyaṁ kareyya, paripanthe tiṭṭheyya, paradāraṁ gaccheyya, gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.1: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.1: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, na ca arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, na ca puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:7.3: Atthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṁ, pubbante aññāṇaṁ, aparante aññāṇaṁ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṁ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.1: Natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṁ, pubbante aññāṇaṁ, aparante aññāṇaṁ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṁ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.3: Hañci natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:9.1: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:9.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.1: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:11.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.2:11.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:12.5: anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammanti?
kv2.2:12.7: Hañci arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:13.6: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:14.8: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:15.7: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:16.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi aññāṇaṁ, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi aññāṇanti.
kv2.2:18.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:18.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:19.5: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:20.4: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:21.6: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.1: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.3: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:24.5: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:25.7: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:27.4: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:27.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:27.6: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā …pe…
kv2.2:27.9: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—
kv2.2:27.10: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:28.4: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:28.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:28.7: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti—
kv2.2:28.8: jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti—
kv2.2:28.9: jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti—
kv2.2:28.11: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:29.4: “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya, sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.2:33.4: “yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
kv2.2:33.5: ‘yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.2:34.4: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyyāti?
kv2.2:34.6: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:35.1: Arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyyāti, atthi arahato aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:35.3: Arahā sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā na jāneyyāti?
